website_summaries.verdict: If you are in the market for an extremely durable and easy-to-construct modern outdoor sectional set, this stylish model will look amazing on your patio for years to come.
pros: Weatherproof cushions, aluminum frame, and resin wicker
cons: The brown set looks nice, but other colors are far pricier or unavailable

customer_reviews.title: Great quality but horrible shipping choice.
customer_reviews.text: The products fit and function is fantastic. No complaints about the quality or process of build. Easy to follow instructions. XPO Logistics was used as the shipping company and would hope i never have to use them again. They changed the shipping date twice and amazon was always different than XPO shipping information. Amazon would say shipping on Saturday and XPO would say Tuesday. Amazon would say signature required and XPO would say no signature required. Extremely confusing.
customer_reviews.author: brandon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price! The price was dropped for a couple of days to under $500 - unbeatable!
customer_reviews.author: SAC

customer_reviews.title: Damaged pieces, getting a replacement in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: I'll update this once I've used it for a bit. It seems nice, except that two pieces were damaged. I'm waiting for a replacement, but am irritated that it will be another 2 weeks before I get it and until then I have to keep this bulk of furniture somewhere in my house. It will end up being in our entryway/living room area where we will be constantly tripping over it (I do not live in a big house!). I would recommend checking for damaged pieces before the delivery driver leaves.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: Better than at first glance out the box!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think its “Real Ashley Furniture”. This is made in China. Its Plastic wicker material not real Wicker woven. Had 2nd thoughts when we opened the box, Looked a little cheap but didn’t want to hassle with returning it and put it together. Its a lot sturdier than I expected when i first opened the box. We are a family of five and i alone am 350lbs and it hold us just fine! We have had them on our porch for about 1 month now and they’re awesome! Time will tell if they hold up and I will update down the road.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: We thought this was not going to work for us as we based everything on measurements and images on Amazon. It fits tall people well, I am 6 ft and can lay on it on both sides. The couches are not too low, quite perfect really. The cushions are nice and firm but not uncomfortably firm. Overall, this buy could really gone wrong but I am glad we purchased it. One things, I used a drill at a low power setting to put it together - watch out as one of the crew head went through one side of the pipe frame metal. I did buy this item on sale - happy shopping.
customer_reviews.author: -E

customer_reviews.title: Love sofa
customer_reviews.text: Love this setup! Its more of a tan color in the pic it looks like cream color. I do love it either way. The pillows are very comfortable and full, Nice thick cushions. Was easy to assemble. Comes in a really big box dropped off by a freight company and they braught it up to my garage. Was great.
customer_reviews.author: Silvia Family

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and Unique Sectional
customer_reviews.text: This sectional is a perfect addition to our patio area. Have not had enough time to determine wear but the cushions and back pillows are very comfortable. Overall, the set is good quality and presents a unique look. It truly is a Signature Design. It was fairly easy to assemble. No problems or set backs. I specifically selected a sectional with 2 loveseats instead of 4 chairs because sections would be easier to keep together. I am very satisfied and happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Irma Moore

customer_reviews.title: Need a replacement cushion!  But love the set!!!
customer_reviews.text: Dave Hayes it when I buy these because of the assembly - which while not complicated is difficult (small Allen wrench torques). I already had one and loved so much we bought this set through amazon. I cannot figure out how to request a replacement cushion cover because it’s ripped. Everything else is great. We love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Lizard

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, it is a decent quality. Most outdoor furniture with similar dimensions are at least $1000. I felt like this was a great bargain. The cushions are fairly comfortable and assembly was quick and can be done with one person. It only took me 20-30 minutes to put the thing together.
customer_reviews.author: babiesrfatTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Brand Name, well known.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and extremely comfortable. Fairly easy to assemble. It be much easier if you had a friend or significant other to help assemble. The only reason for not giving 5 stars is due to some minor unraveling of the wicker on the table and the end seat.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: I was able to get this ser on sale on Memorial Day Weekend. The delivery was fantastic and came wihin the designated time. This couch looks fabulous and is so comfortable. Absolutely the best purchase I made this summer!
customer_reviews.author: andrea digiovanni

customer_reviews.title: Stop looking and buy this
customer_reviews.text: I found this product on the Ashley website for over $1700. A quick Google search and it showed up on Amazon for almost half the price. It sits lower to the ground than I expected. But the cushions are firm and comfortable. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Stone

customer_reviews.title: Nice set!
customer_reviews.text: Love this it's really nice. Light and airy. It is very comfortable, cushions seem well made with nice material.
customer_reviews.author: Elisalaine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It was incredibly easy to assemble. The quality seems great. One of the pieces was damaged out of the box. I called Amazon and they provided a resolution promptly. It is very comfortable. This sectional set is exactly what I hoped it would be.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Missing foot
customer_reviews.text: The couch is nice but it is not as deep as it appeared. Also, I am missing a foot. It is pictured in attachment. I am not able to contact Amazon to just get the foot. It is asking if I want to return the whole thing and I don't want to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie

customer_reviews.title: not our order.
customer_reviews.text: Received someone elses order. No one to talk to. Currently have a cream colored couch in our garage. No outdoor sectional
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used cheap lawn furniture where the cushions take forever to dry, fall off constantly, or the wicker starts to wear quickly. I’ve had this set outside for 2 months now and it still looks brand new. Cushions dry super fast. It hasn’t even gotten scuffed or stained by shoes or pets despite the light beige color. Kind of annoying to tighten the bolts with a manual Allen key but it’s a fairly quick setup. Highly recommended to all.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Heller

customer_reviews.title: You get what you paid for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you paid for. Its just okay. Really cheap plastic weaving, if my 40lb daughter jumped couple times, I’m pretty sure it will break.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: Have had this couch for 4 months. The cushions are firm and it is very comfortable! Quality is very good. We have looked at cheaper options that just don’t compare. Our family sits on this sectional daily now that we are at home more. This feels like commercial grade. Worth the price you won’t be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Steve M

customer_reviews.title: Great patio set, good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this set. Assembly was easy, took less than 20 minutes. The cushions are comfortable and seem to have god stain resistance so far even though we have been taking them inside when it rains. Quality is good especially for the price. Would not hesitate to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mandee E.

customer_reviews.title: Rich Looking Sectional
customer_reviews.text: Happy with this! Held up well all summer, thru rain and sun. Cushions are solid. Piping around cushions is dark brown velvety fabric. Rich looking.
customer_reviews.author: Deb P.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality set
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for our sunroom and could not be happier. The cushions are firm and of good thickness and quality. The fabric seems very durable. We were able to assemble it in under an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Great set at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my deck and couldn’t be happier! The pillows are perfect. The quality of the pillows were very important to me. They’re firm and oh so comfy! I spent way to much time on my deck because of this furniture! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: BRENDA MARABLE

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it was to put together i love how comfortable the cushions . what do i dislike would be it sits lower than i expected but give 5 stars . great price too
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie hall

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Great value and very easy to put together. Good quality.
customer_reviews.author: RJG1999

customer_reviews.title: Very very happy with.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my wife for her to use patio cause i thought it wasn't big enough for 2. But to my surprise its more than comfortable for 2, very sturdy easy to assemble. I was given a delivery date of 1/2/2020 and it arrived 12/26/2019.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED
customer_reviews.text: Items came damaged. Ripped and stained cushions. Hardware was stripped. One piece of furniture was bent. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: Ivana S

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: I would have given a 5 but 1 hole was misaligned not to mention the ottoman has a tear and 2 of the pillow look to have stains. To bad cause looks really nice and comfy but very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Torres

customer_reviews.title: The cushions are so comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this sectional. I bought a different sectional for my other patio and much prefer this sectional. The cushions are amazing. 5 inch thick and so comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Lena Sazo

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful set, good value, easy to assemble and comfy. Time will tell on durability but older reviews seem positive.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: We.ve been looking at outdoor furniture costing two to three times more than this product and we like this more!
customer_reviews.author: M. Detomasi

customer_reviews.title: frame broke after only 6 months
customer_reviews.text: No one would support the warranty Amazon or Ashley I would never buy this outdoor set or any outdoor set from Ashley again very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality & comfort!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product already! Took me 20 minutes to put it together. Cushions are thick & comfortable and don’t slide at all. Amazing patio set!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy
customer_reviews.text: The furniture is beautiful and comfortable. I would definitely recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Tina M Seibel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, comfortable and was really easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I love it! so easy to put together, looks great, is so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey Carter

customer_reviews.title: Good cushion thickness and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable with very good cushion thickness unlike most others available online at Amazon in the same price tier.
customer_reviews.author: Harsh

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Was bend in a bunch of areas after shipping. Product is so flimsy that all pieces had damage from shipping. Not comfortable at all. Bad purchase
customer_reviews.author: STEVE M.

customer_reviews.title: The frame is sturdy and light
customer_reviews.text: The frame is sturdy and light. The cushions are better than the other inexpensive sofas. Assembly took about an hour, but was fairly simple. The back of seats is lower than I had expected, but my wife thinks it's very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mike94040

product_meta.title: Ashley Furniture Signature Design - Loughran Outdoor Sectional Set - Loveseat Sectional, Ottoman & Cocktail Table - Beige & Brown
product_meta.description:
The Loughran 4-piece outdoor sectional set's clean architectural lines and supportive cushioning make being outside even more inviting. All-weather reversible Nuvella™ cushions are finessed with brown piping, and complement the richly hued wicker frames perfectly. Square cocktail table and ottoman cozy up to the sectional with ease.

LOUGHRAN SECTIONAL, TABLE & OTTOMAN FEATURES: Rust free aluminum frame with resin wicker, Room for 5 people, Wood-look resin top coffee table, Durable Nuvella™ solution dyed polyester fabric, The two piece loveseat sectional, ottoman and table ships in one carton.

About us: from design, through fulfillment, Ashley continuously strives to provide you, our customer, with the best values, selection and service in the furniture industry. Our story: established in 1945, Ashley offers one of the industry’s broadest product assortments to retail partners in 123 countries. In less than 10 years, Ashley furniture has become the no. 1 selling furniture store brand in the world and the no. 1 retailer of furniture and bedding in the United States. Our furniture: furniture is our passion. Ashley does it all; we design, build, ship and deliver it to pass savings on to you. Our production teams carefully build each piece, ensuring quality construction and workmanship.All-weather resin wicker handwoven over rust-resistant aluminum frames
feature_bullets: OUTDOOR SECTIONAL SET: Entertaining outside on your porch or deck is a breeze with this 4-piece sectional set. The neutral palette matches with all decor styles, and the table makes dining divine

DURABLE DESIGN: Resin wicker is handwoven over a rust-free, all-weather aluminum frame; tabletop is resin with a wood look. Zippered cushions are made with reversible fade-resistant Nuvella? polyester
MODERN STYLE: The dark wicker furniture frame is a beautiful contrast against the beige cushions for ultra-modern seating that's easy to lounge on. Pair a rug and string lights for added mood

SET OF 4: Includes a 2 piece cushioned sectional, cocktail table and ottoman. Additional Dimensions - LAF loveseat Width: 90.50 inches, Depth: 58.00 inches, Height: 35.50 inches. Ottoman Width: 26.50 inches, Depth: 26.50 inches, Height: 17.75 inches. Cocktail table Width: 29.50 inches, Depth: 29.50 inches, Height: 14.50 inches. Seat width: 66.00 inches, depth: 74.00 inches, height: 18.00 inches. Top of cushion to top of back: 16.50 inches.
ASSEMBLY REQUIRED: Easy-to-follow instructions, hardware and tools included. For best care, simply clean fabric with mild soap and water, then air dry
DIRECT FROM THE MANUFACTURER: Ashley Furniture goes the extra mile to package, protect and deliver your purchase in a timely manner

BUY WITH CONFIDENCE: Designed and manufactured by Ashley Furniture Industries. The trusted source for stylish furniture, lighting, rugs, accessories and mattresses. For every taste and budget.Seat height: 18 inch

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars92 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
